title: Lead (Pb) Management in the Entire Life Cycle of Highly Efficient and Stable Perovskite Solar Cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01829J, Paper
Kai Liu, Tianxiang Hu, Zenghua Cai, Fengcai Liu, Saqib Rafique, Xiaoguo Li, Liangliang Deng, Chongyuan Li, Xiaofei Yue, Yanyan Wang, Qiang Guo, Jiao Wang, Yingguo Yang, Chunxiao Cong, Shiyou Chen, Jia Zhang, Anran Yu, Yiqiang Zhan
Lead (Pb) related issues severely affect the entire life-cycle of perovskite solar cells (PSCs) which includes Pb-related defects during preparation, photolysis of excessive PbI2 during the operation and Pb2+ leakage...
